TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_bantek, title = bantek, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/bantek} }

S.FORM: bantek 鳥踏陷阱 bantek ku sapibihkac tu mubahelay a ayam. siwkay nu bantek u bantek sa, sapisanga' nu auk , ciid nu kiliang atu lait. maitekel ku ayam atu adidiay a aadupen. anu mazipa' kya telis nu auk, mabetil tu ku auk, masiket tu lait, maala tu ku ayam atu adidi'ay a aadupan. tinaku a kamu pabantek 放陷阱 pabantek ci Bunuk i buyubuyuan tu elielip. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika Animal trapping, or simply trapping, is the use of a device to remotely catch an animal. Animals may be trapped for a variety of purposes, including food, the fur trade, hunting, pest control, and wildlife management.

bantek 鳥踏陷阱 bantek ko sapibihkac to mobahelay a ayam. siwkay no bantek o bantek sa, sapisanga' no aok , ciid no kiliang ato lait. maitekel ko ayam ato adidiay a aadopen. ano mazipa' kya telis no aok, mabetil to ko aok, masiket to lait, maala to ko ayam ato adidi'ay a aadopan. tinako a kamo pabantek 放陷阱 pabantek ci Bonok i boyoboyoan to elielip. o solit no Holam ato Amilika Animal trapping, or simply trapping, is the ose of a device to remotely catch an animal. Animals may be trapped for a variety of porposes, incloding food, the for trade, honting, pest control, and wildlife management.
